trans-unit.source: Represents an element that has a value within a specific range.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento que tem um valor dentro de um intervalo específico.

trans-unit.source: A RangeBase control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> that can be set between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo RangeBase tem um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>que pode ser definida entre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RangeBase visually indicates its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O RangeBase visualmente indica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the user can interactively set the value; in other cases, the value can be set only programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Em alguns casos, o utilizador interativamente pode definir o valor; noutros casos, o valor pode ser definido apenas através de programação.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: O utilizador pode definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, mas não o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor a ser adicionados ou subtraído o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> determines how this property is used.
trans-unit.target: Um controlo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>determina a forma como esta propriedade é utilizada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador clica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>propriedade aumenta ou diminui pelo valor LargeChange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When the user invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> commands on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> of the slider changes by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador invoca o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A>comandos um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty>as alterações de controlo de deslize pelo valor LargeChange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> does not use this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>não utilizar esta propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.target: <>*> Para adicionar a ou subtrair a <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 1.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the highest possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the range element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o mais elevado possível <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>do elemento de intervalo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 10.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>substitui os metadados desta propriedade e define predefinido para 10.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 100.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>substitui os metadados desta propriedade e define predefinido a 100.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> can use this method to respond when the value property changes instead of overriding the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata> to provide a new <xref:System.Windows.PropertyChangedCallback> function.

trans-unit.source: The OnValueChanged method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O método OnValueChanged gera o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueChanged>

trans-unit.source: When overriding OnValueChanged in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s OnValueChanged method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir OnValueChanged numa classe derivada, lembre-se de que chamar o método de OnValueChanged a classe base para que os delegados registados recebem o evento.

trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador clica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>propriedade aumenta ou diminui pelo valor SmallChange.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0.1.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Provides a string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma representação de cadeia de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that provides the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve uma cadeia que fornece os valores de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a representação de cadeia de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a importância do controlo intervalo atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control visually indicates the Value property in some way.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>controlo visualmente indica a propriedade Value de alguma forma.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the slider and scrollbar controls have a thumb that is synchronized with the Value of the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os controlos de deslize e scrollbar tem um botão do controlo que está sincronizado com o valor do controlo.

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o valor para um número que é menor que a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>propriedade, o valor é definido para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se definir o valor para um número que é maior do que a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>propriedade, o valor é definido para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: A importância atual do controlo de intervalo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the range value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o valor de intervalo é alterado.
